title: Ya Hoo!
description: Hold on to your pitchforks, everybody. It’s time again for Ya Hoo! Your favorite country-western variety show featuring jokes, comedy sketches, and musical performances.
starring: The Ya Hoo! Recovering Alcoholic Jug Band
altHero: a donkey in overalls and a straw hat has crossed out eyes and smoke escapes from his ears
alt1: two farmers in a field of corn
alt2: a smiling woman with big hair and a missing tooth
